scripts.clearBuild: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && mkdir build/images && mkdir build/images/dist && mkdir build/fonts && mkdir build/js && mkdir build/css && mkdir build/css/vendor
scripts.copyAssets: cp -r images/dist/ build/images/dist && cp -r fonts/ build/fonts && cp -r js/ build/js && cp -r css/vendor/ build/css/vendor
scripts.copyFiles: cp *.html build/ && cp style.css build/ && cp *.json build/
scripts.build: gulp sass && gulp js && gulp images && npm run clearBuild && npm run copyAssets && npm run copyFiles && npm run copyOther
scripts.buildLite: npm run clearBuild && npm run copyAssets && npm run copyFiles && npm run copyOther
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && now && now alias
scripts.deployLite: npm run buildLite && cd build && now && now alias
